departments.name: Health Assessment
departments.info: Comprehensive evaluation, vital signs, medical history, lifestyle analysis, and current health status for personalized wellness insights.

departments.name: Antenatal Care
departments.info: Antenatal care is the care you get from health professionals during your pregnancy.

departments.name: Postnatal Service
departments.info: Tailored care for new mothers and infants, including postpartum support, health monitoring, and infant development guidance.

departments.name: Child health
departments.info: Holistic care for children, covering vaccinations, growth monitoring, developmental milestones, nutrition guidance, and wellness checks for optimal health.

departments.name: Psychosocial health
departments.info: Expert support for mental and emotional well-being, encompassing counseling, stress management, coping strategies, and interpersonal relationship guidance.

departments.name: Pre-pregnancy Check-up
departments.info: Comprehensive assessment for aspiring parents, addressing reproductive health, lifestyle factors, and medical considerations to optimize chances of a healthy pregnancy.
